meanings.definition: A person actively engaged in an art, discipline, or profession.
meanings.sent1: The practitioners of medicine work hard to help people stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: Dentists and doctors are examples of practitioners in the field of healthcare.
meanings.sent3: The practitioners of cooking in this kitchen are known for their delicious meals.
meanings.sent4: She is a practitioner of kindness, always ready to lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent5: The practitioners of law ensure justice is served in society.

meanings.definition: One who practices something regularly or habitually.
meanings.sent1: As a practitioner of yoga, she finds peace and balance in her daily routine.
meanings.sent2: Athletes are practitioners of their sport, constantly training to improve.
meanings.sent3: The practitioners of bad jokes in the office always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: He is a practitioner of patience, always calm in challenging situations.
meanings.sent5: The practitioners of good manners are respected by everyone they meet.
